DOC.brief_summary: As cancer treatment improve , cancer survivor 's quality life level function gain increase importance . Pelvic floor function directly affect gynecological cancer treatment , pelvic floor dysfunction ( PFD ) severely affect patient 's life . PFD negatively affect health-related quality life ( HRQOL ) . Evaluation PFD provide information disease burden treatment-related effect directly patient 's perspective informs clinical decision-making . The pelvic floor musculature sacral nerve easily accessible , difficult test . Several functional assessment use evaluate pelvic floor dysfunction ; however , report methodology sparse , consensus use lack . Research functional outcome highly complex , consequently , must address comprehensive framework .
DOC.brief_title: Pelvic Floor Rehabilitation Gynecological Cancer Patients
DOC.detailed_description: Patients cervical colorectal cancer underwent surgery radiotherapy recruit study . - PFM strength measure use perineometer ( BioCon-200 , McubeTechnologyCompany , Seoul , Korea ) . Vaginal pressure measure use vaginal silicon pressure sensor ( cmH2O ; sensitivity0.06kPa , sensitivity 5mV , threshold1.5V ) . - The motor evoke potential ( MEPs ) pelvic floor obtain sacral transcranial magnetic stimulation use Magstim 200 stimulator ( Magstim Co. , Whitland , Wales , UK ) . Patients instructed lie leave lateral decubitus position , intra-anal sponge electrode ( Dantec , Skovlund , Denmark ) lubricate gently insert anal canal . - Monophasic single pulse magnetic stimulus deliver vertex correspond primary motor center precentral gyrus use double-cone coil ( 9902-00 , Magstim ) . A figure-eight coil ( 9762-00 , Magstim ) use stimulate dorsolateral area sacrum correspond exit sacral cortical facilitation - We measure latency , amplitude , excitability threshold ( ET ) MEPs detect pelvic floor muscle without facilitation . The excitability threshold rest ( RET ) define low intensity produce MEP responses 100Î¼V For optimal facilitation , measure latency MEPs minimal contraction ( 10 % MVC ) RET intensity amplitude moderate contraction - Patient-reported HRQOL Quality life General condition-specific aspect HRQOL assess use EORTC QLQ-C30 questionnaire .
DOC.criteria: Women gynecological cancer radical hysterectomy pelvic lymph node dissection infectious disease urinary tract vagina
